Naglaa (ma ọ bụ Nijla, ma ọ bụ Nagla) Mahfouz (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Odee, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ese ihe n'Ijipt.
Mahfoud bụ osote onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Ahram.
A mụrụ Nijla Mahfouz n'afọ 1959 na Cairo, Ijipt
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze site na ngalaba nke mgbasa ozi ọha mmadụ na Mahadum Cairo na 1979.
Mahfouz bụ onye odee na osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Ahram

N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, gụnyere ịkwadebe na igosi mmemme redio na IslamOnline, gụnyere Make Your Success with Naglaa Mahfouz na Win the Religion and the World programs.
Na mgbakwunye na ihe odide ya kwa izu banyere mmepe mmadụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ "Bus and Tal", n'okpuru isiokwu "Enwere ihe ịga nke ọma gị", yana ihe odide ya n'ọhịa mmekọrịta ezinụlọ

Mahfouz na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ndụmọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na "Egyptian Youth Magazine" na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ "Bus and Tal", mpaghara ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na "E Egyptian Saudi Group for Telephone Consultations and Information Technology", "IslamOnline" na "The Nation's Website".
Najla ebipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri anọ na asatọ na isiokwu gụnyere ọrụ ebere, nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na mmepe mmadụ
O dekwara ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ụmụaka iri ise na isii.
Mahfouz bụ onye na-ese plastik na onye otu nke Cairo Atelier na Association for Contemporary Heritage Arts

O meela ihe ngosi nka isii, na-egosi ihe osise mmanụ ya, ite na ihe ọkpụkpụ, gụnyere ihe ngosi onwe onye na ihe ngosi otu dị ka The Giving Exhibition na Arts Complex na 1992, na mgbakwunye na ihe ngosi mba ụwa dị ka ihe ngosi akpọrọ Only the Light is Richer化 nke emere na Mahadum Britain na Jụn afọ 2010
Ihe ngosi ya gụnyere gallery Shomoua (1995), Cairo Atelier (1995) na Al-Ahram (1999).
